remarks: The sum rule for derivatives at a point.  For the (simpler but more limited) function version, see ~ dvadd .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2016.)
statement:
dvadd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvadd.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ S ) $.
dvadd.g $e |- ( ph -> G : Y --> CC ) $.
dvadd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ S ) $.
dvaddbr.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
dvadd.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
dvadd.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. V ) $.
dvadd.bf $e |- ( ph -> C ( S _D F ) K ) $.
dvadd.bg $e |- ( ph -> C ( S _D G ) L ) $.
dvadd.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvaddbr $p |- ( ph -> C ( S _D ( F oF + G ) ) ( K + L ) ) $.
